summary: Rimona is a One-Handed/Ice Mage follower available in HDT & Non-HDT UUNP & CBBE body types; with and without armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=6][b]Rimona[/b][/size][/color]

Based on thedoodlebob/PillowFun's Character on their [url=http://pillowfun.tumblr.com/]Tumblr[/url] & [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/142802153@N06/]Flickr[/url] Account
Permission granted for follower creation by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6786683/?]thedoodlebob[/url] aka PIllowFun

[/font][font=Verdana]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5uz5agb9j/1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Rimona
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  40
Body:  HDT & Non-HDT UUNP/CBBE
Skin:  Demoniac (2k & 4k options)
Armor:  Celes Nightingale Armor (doubled armor rating)
[i]*No Armor Versions she will be naked*[/i]
Weapons:  Celes Hooma, Bow, Arrows, & Her Hands
Location:  Riverwood - Sleeping Giant

[i]*Tattoos used in some screenshots are not on follower mod*

[/i]Fighting Style:  One Handed with Spells on Left Hand

Levels with player.
Skills bonuses/Perk trees:  Conjuration, Destruction, Restoration, Illusion, One Hand, Light Armor

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs Pictured:  SnapDragon, Vividan, & RealVision

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/b7nzokz5z/2.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]﻿

[b][u]Armor Version
[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels[/url]
HDT Compatible Skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]

[b][u]HDT Body Type
[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
HDT Compatible Skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]

[b][u]Non-HDT - No Armor Versions[/u][/b]

No Known Requirements

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]
Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/aflbpduyv/30464514000_8701c0309a_k.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/e7z6q0lqf/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4v36zn7d3/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/w0kqxw2yv/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6786683/?]thedoodlebob[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective
[/url]
[/font][/center][center][font=Verdana][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  Not without express permission from thedoodlebob aka PillowFun

Q:  What is the other armor pictured in some screenshots?
A:  Underworld Armor (Google is your friend)

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.
A:  I will probably refuse any little girl/boy looking follower requests though.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cdhquj9c7/CreditsResources.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6786683/?]thedoodlebob[/url]
[url=http://pillowfun.tumblr.com/]Pillow Fun Tumblr[/url]
[url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/142802153@N06/]Pillow Fun Flickr[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67595/?]Celes Nightingale Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniac Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75674/?]Linds Human Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79586/?]2k Lip Tints[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url]
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3148-yevmods-makeup-pack-ymmp-2k-4k/]YevMods - Makeup Pack[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
Bethesda

*If I forgot anyone; please kindly remind me.  Thank You*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/b4ygmn6rr/Permissions.png[/img]
This follower is the combination of the work of others.  Please obtain their permissions in addition to mine.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p6kp11og7/6.jpg[/img]

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]HOT FILES 11/2016!!!  THANK YOU EVERYONE!!!
[/size][/color]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3oda5hzif/rimonahotfile.jpg[/img]

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:[/size][/color]
[/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/35629995/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/vn7axqznr/mfeile1974_Link.png[/img][/url][/center]
